original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 325.25/45 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 325.25/45 to the US dollar on Friday, from 326.25/40 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.50/65 percent from 13.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.80/90 percent from 13.80/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.75/85 percent from 13.70/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.05/15 percent from 14.00/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.05/20 percent, from 14.05/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.10/30 percent, from 14.10/25 percent. (Colombo/Dec22/2023)
